original_title: Sri Lanka bond yields steady at close
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s bond yields were steady at close on Monday following a bond auction, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 closed unchanged at 31.75/32.00 percent on Monday.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 closed at 28.00/10 percent, steady from 27.75/28.25 percent on Friday.
